data.title: Never Enough (Loren Allred song)
data.text:
2017 song by Loren Allred

"Never Enough"Song by Loren Allredfrom the album The Greatest Showman: Original Motion Picture Soundtrack Recorded2017Length3:27LabelAtlanticSongwriter(s)Benj Pasek and Justin PaulProducer(s)

Joseph Trapanese

Justin Paul

Alex Lacamoire

Audio on YouTube

"Never Enough" is a song performed by Loren Allred for the film The Greatest Showman (2017). It is the second track from soundtrack of the film, The Greatest Showman: Original Motion Picture Soundtrack, released in the same year. A reimagined version was performed by American singer Kelly Clarkson.
